name: ai-server-faceswap
description: A Node.js server for face swapping using FaceFusion

scripts.start-local: set HOST=127.0.0.1&& set PORT=9001&& set PROTOCOL=http&& node dist/server.js
scripts.start-network: set HOST=0.0.0.0&& set PORT=9001&& set PROTOCOL=http&& node dist/server.js
scripts.start-https: set HOST=0.0.0.0&& set PORT=9001&& set PROTOCOL=https&& node dist/server.js
scripts.dev-local: set HOST=127.0.0.1&& set PORT=9001&& set PROTOCOL=http&& ts-node src/server.ts
scripts.dev-network: set HOST=0.0.0.0&& set PORT=9001&& set PROTOCOL=http&& ts-node src/server.ts
scripts.dev-https: set HOST=0.0.0.0&& set PORT=9001&& set PROTOCOL=https&& ts-node src/server.ts

author: Developer
